name: UIApplicationShortcutIcon
desc: An image you can optionally associate with a Home screen quick action to improve its appearance and usability.

items.name: init(type: UIApplicationShortcutIcon.IconType)
items.desc: Creates a Home screen quick action icon using a system-defined image.

items.name: init(templateImageName: String)
items.desc: Creates a Home Screen quick action icon based on an image in your appâ€™s bundle, preferably in an asset catalog.

items.name: init(systemImageName: String)
items.desc: Creates a Home screen quick action icon using a system symbol image.

items.name: init(contact: CNContact)
items.desc: Creates a Home screen quick action icon from the picture for a contact or a monogram of the contact name if the picture unavailable.
